alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gilmer (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:55PM EDT until August 07 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR LUMPKIN...SOUTHEASTERN GILMER...SOUTHERN WHITE...DAWSON AND PICKENS COUNTIES... At 355 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Juno to near Jasper to Salacoa Valley, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dahlonega, Jasper, Cleveland, Dawsonville, Nelson, Helen, Talking Rock, Amicalola Falls State Park, Sequoyah Lake, Juno, Fausett Lake, Len Foote Hike Inn, Talmadge, Tate, Turners Corner, Qualatchee Lake, McKee, Camp Merrill, Marblehill, and Camp Coleman Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
